mapper.insert: insert into sea_crons (cronid, available, type, name, filename, lastrun, nextrun, weekday, day, hour, minute) values (#{cronid,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{available,jdbcType=BIT}, #{type,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{filename,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{lastrun,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{nextrun,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{weekday,jdbcType=BIT}, #{day,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{hour,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{minute,jdbcType=CHAR})
mapper.update: update sea_crons set available = #{available,jdbcType=BIT}, type = #{type,jdbcType=CHAR}, name = #{name,jdbcType=CHAR}, filename = #{filename,jdbcType=CHAR}, lastrun = #{lastrun,jdbcType=INTEGER}, nextrun = #{nextrun,jdbcType=INTEGER}, weekday = #{weekday,jdbcType=BIT}, day = #{day,jdbcType=TINYINT}, hour = #{hour,jdbcType=TINYINT}, minute = #{minute,jdbcType=CHAR} where cronid = #{cronid,jdbcType=SMALLINT}
mapper.select: select cronid, available, type, name, filename, lastrun, nextrun, weekday, day, hour, minute from sea_crons where cronid = #{cronid,jdbcType=SMALLINT}
select cronid, available, type, name, filename, lastrun, nextrun, weekday, day, hour, minute from sea_crons
